tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE water_usage_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    water_usage_gallons INT,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE water_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farming_activity_id INT,
    water_source_id INT,
    amount_used INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (farming_activity_id) REFERENCES farming_activities(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (water_source_id) REFERENCES water_sources(id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterUsage (
  usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  farm_id INT NOT NULL,
  source_id INT NOT NULL,
  amount_gallons INT NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES Farms(farm_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES WaterSources(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  farm_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  total_usage_gallons INT NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_farm_id FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES Farms(farm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterSources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255),
    source_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE WaterUsage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id INT,
    date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES WaterSources(id)
)

CREATE TABLE FarmingActivities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ActivityReport (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_id INT,
    date DATE,
    report_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES FarmingActivities(id)
)

CREATE TABLE Regulations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
    regulation_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)
